sourcesContent:
import React from "react";
import {
  Card,
  CardContent,
  CardMedia,
  Typography,
  Grid,
  IconButton,
  Box,
} from "@mui/material";
import EmailIcon from "@mui/icons-material/Email";
import InstagramIcon from "@mui/icons-material/Instagram";
import FlickrIcon from "@mui/icons-material/PhotoLibrary";
import SchoolIcon from "@mui/icons-material/School";
import LinkIcon from "@mui/icons-material/Link";

const ProfileCard = () => {
  return (
    <Card
      sx={{
        maxWidth: 345,
        padding: 2,
        borderRadius: 5,
        textAlign: "center",
      }}
    >
      {/* 头像 */}
      <CardMedia
        component="img"
        alt="Steven LUo"
        src={require('../assets/img/steven_cartoon.JPG')}
        sx={{
          width: 100,
          height: 100,
          margin: "0 auto",
          borderRadius: "40%", // 圆形效果
          border: "2px solid #ccc", // 可选：添加边框修饰
          boxShadow: "0 4px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)", // 可选：添加阴影
        }}
      />
      {/* 内容 */}
      <CardContent>
        <Typography variant="h6" component="div">
          Xi Luo
        </Typography>
        <Typography variant="subtitle1" color="text.secondary">
          Junior Machine Learning Engineer 
        </Typography>
        <Typography variant="body2" color="text.secondary" sx={{ mt: 1 }}>
            @addaxis.ai
        </Typography>
      </CardContent>

      {/* 按钮区域 */}
      <Box>
        <Grid container justifyContent="center" spacing={2}>
          <Grid item>
            <IconButton
              href="#"
              color="primary"
              aria-label="email"
            >
              <EmailIcon />
            </IconButton>
          </Grid>
          <Grid item>
            <IconButton
              href="#"
              color="secondary"
              aria-label="instagram"
            >
              <InstagramIcon />
            </IconButton>
          </Grid>
          <Grid item>
            <IconButton
              href="#"
              color="default"
              aria-label="flickr"
            >
              <FlickrIcon />
            </IconButton>
          </Grid>
          <Grid item>
            <IconButton
              href="#"
              color="info"
              aria-label="google scholar"
            >
              <SchoolIcon />
            </IconButton>
          </Grid>
          <Grid item>
            <IconButton
              href="#"
              color="default"
              aria-label="orcid"
            >
              <LinkIcon />
            </IconButton>
          </Grid>
        </Grid>
      </Box>
    </Card>
  );
};

export default ProfileCard;
